titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Collection of 78 rpm 10-inch Records, approximately 1908-1950
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by John Bewley

publicationstmt.publisher: State University of New York at Buffalo. Music Library
publicationstmt.p: © 2018. State University of New York at Buffalo. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in EAD by John Bewley, December 2018.

did.head: Collection Overview

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: State University of New York at Buffalo. Music Library

did.langmaterial: Spoken and sung material in collection in English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: State University of New York at Buffalo. Music Library

did.abstract: The collection contains 37 78 rpm 10-inch recordings, 1 7-inch 78 rpm recording, 1 5-inch 78 rpm recording, and 1 7-inch 45 rpm recording. The recordings are all commercial releases consisting of classical, ethnic, and popular music.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Specified item], Collection of 78 rpm 10-inch Records, approximately 1908-1950, Music Library, The State University of New York at Buffalo.

accessrestrict.head: Terms of Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials can be examined by qualified researchers in the Music Library during hours of operation during which Music Librarians are present. In order to insure access, researchers are advised to contact the Music Library in advance of visits.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright for the materials in the collection does not reside with the Music Library. Therefore, patrons wishing to publish any item, or part of an item from this collection for any purpose, are responsible for securing requisite permissions.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Compiled by staff of the State University of New York at Buffalo, Music Library.

accruals.head: Accruals and Additions
accruals.p: No further accruals are expected to this collection.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The rationale for compiling this collection has been lost. The Music Library holds numerous 78 rpm records as historical examples of the labels available and repertoire issued on them.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains 37 78 rpm 10-inch recordings, 1 7-inch 78 rpm recording, 1 5-inch 78 rpm recording, and 1 7-inch 45 rpm recording. The recordings are all commercial releases consisting of classical, ethnic, and popular music.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in alphabetical order by recording company and then in numerical order by label number.
